bill.summary:
Accessing Professional Partnerships and Resources to Enable Necessary Training and Improve Career Education Act of 2018 or the APPRENTICE Act
This bill directs the Department of Labor to provide grants to state-recognized or federally recognized apprenticeship programs to support the expansion, awareness, and prestige of such programs.
